H0.text: To reduce the amount of work for all involved is the main advantage of using mathematical models and computer simulations to study the spread of infectious diseases.

H1.text: To reduce the cost of conducting experiments on people is the main advantage of using mathematical models and computer simulations to study the spread of infectious diseases.

H2.text: To obtain results quickly in a short period of time is the main advantage of using mathematical models and computer simulations to study the spread of infectious diseases, a technique scientists often use to study systems.

H3.text: Performing experiments that would be irresponsible using human subjects is the main advantage of using mathematical models and computer simulations for studying the spread of infectious diseases.

A4.text: Mathematical models can predict future growth patterns, etc.
